5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Bakrah that when the Prophet (ﷺ) heard news that made him happy, or for which one should be happy, he would fall down prostrate in gratitude to Allah, the Blessed and Exalted

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الصَّلاَةِ وَالسَّجْدَةِ عِنْدَ الشُّكْرِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning Prayer and prostration at times of gratitude
